title: FTTH_FIB-Tool implementation infrastructure order GIGA GS topics (Q3/25)
description:
Description
Requirements for the FIB tool regarding the capability Infrastructure Order, where concept and implementation to be done Q3/2025 will be descripted here:
Overview of topics see checklist below
out-of-scope in first MVP for FIB-Tool
no Public and Classified customers with extra security requirements 
no access for Offshore colleagues
no Geo-customers
Expand "Standardbauweise" for GK-customer
Wholebuy  
FIB Stand alone?          
Self.Service
Integration IKLE
